Movie: 8/10 

One of the great movies seen in malayalam over a long period of time.

Interesting and nice story line, builds suspense, holds interest, well edited i.e, no non-sensible scenes. An appropriate climax. All together a movie worth watching. Not like usual malayalam movies. Great moral of the story.
Good movie but only to watch once Also end was not very good but story was good......

very good print...The axxo of malayalam movies
